content.raw_text: From: Apple TV+ no_reply@email.apple.com To: Lars Benedetti lars.benedetti@posteo.eu Date: Thu, 24 Aug 2023 08:16:22 +0100 Subject: Welcome to Apple TV+ — Start streaming now Welcome to Apple TV+ Hi Lars, You’re in. Your journey into Apple Originals begins now. On 24 August 2023, your subscription to Apple TV+ was successfully activated. From deeply emotional dramas and high-stakes thrillers to award-winning documentaries and lighthearted comedies, we’re excited to bring stories to life — just for you. Whether you're watching on iPhone during a train ride, on your iPad while relaxing, or on your Apple TV with family at home, we've made it simple for you to enjoy every moment. Apple TV+ is ad-free and crafted to fit seamlessly into your day. Here's what you can expect: Exclusive access to Apple Original series and films. No ads. Just the story — uninterrupted. Stream anywhere, anytime, across all your Apple devices. Need a recommendation to get started? Try “Silo” for an edge-of-your-seat mystery or laugh along with “Ted Lasso,” our multi-Emmy® winner. With new episodes released weekly and fresh stories launching regularly, there’s always something waiting. Click below to start watching your next favorite show. [Start Watching] Thanks for joining us, —The Apple TV+ Team Need help? Visit Apple Support or manage your subscription in your device settings. Apple Inc. One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, CA 95014, United States © 2023 Apple Inc. All rights reserved. Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

From: Apple TV+ subscriptions@support.apple.com To: Anaïs García anais.garcia@protonmail.com Date: Tue, 5 Dec 2023 14:22:10 +0100 Subject: Your trial ends soon — continue the story Your free trial ends in 3 days Hi Anaïs, Thanks for being part of our Apple TV+ community. Your free trial will end on 8 December 2023, but there’s still time to finish what you’ve started — and discover even more. In the past few weeks, you’ve watched Finch, See, and caught a glimpse of the intriguing world of Foundation. When your trial ends, your subscription will automatically continue at ₹99/month, so you won’t miss out on next week’s new Severance episode or the finale of Pachinko. Here’s what staying with us means: Ad-free streaming on all your Apple devices—phone, tablet, TV, Mac. Eye‑opening originals: From sci‑fi mysteries to heartwarming comedies. Weekly episode drops and special films just for you. If you'd rather take a break, simply cancel before 8 December 2023 in your Apple TV subscription settings. But thousands of fans are choosing to stay—and we think you will too. [Continue Watching] Looking forward to seeing you soon, —The Apple TV+ Team Need help with your subscription? Visit support.apple.com/tv or manage your trial in your device settings. Apple Inc., One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, CA 95014, United States © 2023 Apple Inc. All rights reserved. Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

From: Apple no_reply@id.apple.com To: Maja Novak maja.novak@seznam.cz Date: Wed, 13 Sep 2023 11:07:22 +0200 Subject: Your receipt from Apple Your Apple receipt is ready Hello Maja Novak, Thank you for your payment. Here’s a summary of your Apple TV+ transaction: Invoice #: 1234567890 Date Paid: 12 September 2023, 17:03 CET Payment Method:••• 4321 (Mastercard) Subscription: Apple TV+ Monthly Plan Amount: CZK 99.00 What happens next Your subscription to Apple TV+ continues without interruption. Future payments will be charged automatically on the same day each month. You can manage or cancel your subscription anytime via your Apple ID settings or by visiting reportaproblem.apple.com. What you get Ad-free access to Apple TV+ Originals on all your devices New episodes released weekly Seamless experience across iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, and Mac If you didn’t authorize this charge or need help, please visit support.apple.com. We're here to assist. Thank you for choosing Apple TV+. We look forward to bringing you more great stories. Warm regards, —The Apple Support Team Apple Inc. One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, CA 95014, USA © 2023 Apple Inc. All rights reserved. Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

From: Apple no_reply@id.apple.com To: Isabel Rossi isabel.rossi@virgilio.it Date: Fri, 1 Dec 2023 09:45:12 +0100 Subject: Your Apple TV+ subscription is confirmed Your subscription is now active Hello Isabel Rossi, Welcome to Apple TV+. Your subscription began on 1 December 2023. Thank you for choosing our service—you’re now set to enjoy Apple Originals, award-winning films, and exclusive content whenever and wherever you like. Subscription Details Subscription Type: Apple TV+ Monthly Plan Start Date: 1 December 2023 Pricing: €6.99 per month, billed monthly Next Billing Date: 1 January 2024 Payment Method: •••• 1234 (Visa) What’s next? Start exploring our library—whether you're in the mood for uplifting drama, laugh-out-loud comedy, or gripping documentary. Why not begin with our current fan-favorite, The Morning Show, and keep an eye out for the upcoming premiere of Silo next week? Your plan is ad-free, supports HDR and Dolby Atmos, and works seamlessly across all your Apple devices. Need to manage your subscription? You can pause or cancel anytime by visiting your Apple TV subscription settings or going to reportaproblem.apple.com. If you ever need assistance, our friendly Apple Support team is here to help. Thanks for joining us—happy streaming! —The Apple TV+ Team Apple Inc. • One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, CA 95014, USA © 2023 Apple Inc. All rights reserved. Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

From: Apple no_reply@email.apple.com To: Jónas Eklund jonas.eklund@telia.com Date: Fri, 8 Dec 2023 17:28:05 +0100 Subject: There’s a problem with your payment method There was a problem with your payment Hi Jónas, We’ve been unable to renew your Apple TV+ subscription. Your payment method •••• 5678 (Visa) couldn’t be charged for the 8 December 2023 renewal. To avoid interruption, please update your payment information at your earliest convenience. What you can do now In your Apple ID account: Go to Settings > [Your Name] > Payment & Shipping (on iPhone/iPad) or App Store > [Your Name] > View Information (on Mac). Update your current payment method or add a new card. We’ll automatically retry the charge—no need to resubscribe. Why it’s worth acting now Keep streaming without missing episodes of Severance, Pachinko, and Ted Lasso. Continue with ad‑free access across all Apple devices. Avoid having to manually restart your subscription later. We’ll attempt to charge your account again over the next few days. If you prefer not to continue Apple TV+, you can cancel at any time in your subscription settings. Need help? Visit support.apple.com or go to Settings > Apple ID > Support on your device. We’re here for you. Thanks for your attention—let’s keep you streaming. —The Apple TV+ Team Apple Inc. • One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, CA 95014, USA © 2023 Apple Inc. All rights reserved. Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

From: Apple no_reply@id.apple.com To: Carlos Fernández carlos.fernandez@correo.es Date: Tue, 3 Oct 2023 10:14:08 +0200 Subject: Your refund has been issued Your refund is on its way Hello Carlos Fernández, We’ve processed your refund request for your Apple TV+ subscription. On 2 October 2023, we refunded €6.99 to your **** 9876 (Visa) card. It may take 3–5 business days for the credit to appear, depending on your bank. Here’s what this means for you We appreciate your time with Apple TV+. Your access to Apple TV+ Originals will end at the close of your current billing period, but you can re‑subscribe anytime. If this refund was unexpected or you have questions, our Support team is ready to help—just visit support.apple.com. Why it’s processed this way You were charged €6.99 on 1 October 2023, and since you requested a full refund within 48 hours, we promptly initiated the credit. The refund goes back to the same payment method you used, and you’ll receive confirmation via this email. Thanks for choosing Apple TV+. We hope to see you again soon. —The Apple Support Team Apple Inc. • One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, CA 95014, USA © 2023 Apple Inc. All rights reserved. Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

From: Apple no_reply@id.apple.com To: Elodie Dubois elodie.dubois@laposte.net Date: Wed, 6 Dec 2023 12:45:10 +0100 Subject: Your payment method wasn’t updated There was an issue with your payment method Hi Elodie, We tried to renew your Apple TV+ subscription today for 6 December 2023, but your card ending in •••• 4321 (Visa) couldn’t be charged. This may be due to an expired card, an expired billing address, or a declined transaction. To ensure uninterrupted access to the shows you love—like Severance, Liaison, and Pachinko—please update your payment method as soon as you can. Next steps to resolve On your iPhone or iPad, open Settings → tap your name → Payment & Shipping. On Mac, open the App Store app → click your name → View Information → Manage Payments. Update the existing card or add a new one. After that, we’ll retry the payment automatically—no need to resubscribe. Why updating helps Your subscription will continue without interruption. You’ll keep streaming ad-free across iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, and Mac. You won’t lose your place in ongoing series or upcoming premieres. We’ll make additional attempts over the next few days. If you’d prefer not to continue Apple TV+, you can cancel in Settings → Subscriptions before your access ends. Need help? Visit support.apple.com or open Support in your device settings. We’re here to assist. Thanks for your attention—let’s keep you streaming. —The Apple TV+ Team Apple Inc. • One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, CA 95014, USA © 2023 Apple Inc. All rights reserved. Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

From: Apple no_reply@id.apple.com To: Markus van Dijk markus.vandijk@ziggo.nl Date: Mon, 15 Nov 2023 09:32:45 +0100 Subject: Your Apple TV+ subscription has been canceled Your subscription is canceled Hello Markus van Dijk, This is confirmation that your Apple TV+ subscription was canceled on 15 November 2023. You’ll continue to have full access to Apple TV+ Originals—like Severance, For All Mankind, and Pachinko—until 15 December 2023, which is the end of your current billing period. What to expect next After 15 December 2023, your subscription will not renew and your billing will stop. You can still enjoy shows and movies until your access ends. If you'd like to return later, resubscribing is simple—just tap the “Subscribe” button in the Apple TV app anytime. Need help? Visit support.apple.com or go to Settings > [Your Name] > Subscriptions on your device. Our team is here to assist with any questions about billing, service access, or content. Thank you for watching with us—we hope to welcome you back soon. —The Apple TV+ Team Apple Inc. • One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, CA 95014, USA © 2023 Apple Inc. All rights reserved. Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions
